name: .VCR File Extension
summary: Learn about .VCR files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Video file recorded by ATI video cards through the ATI Multimedia Center, a program bundled with ATI video card purchases; contains video data recorded from the computer's screen while running programs; used to capture video game replays or TV on the computer.

content: VCR files are stored in a proprietary format, but they may be converted to MPEG2 using the ATI Library within the ATI Multimedia Center.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
